object.script:
-- Author: <Authorname> (Please change this in user settings, Ctrl+Comma) -- GitHub: <GithubLink> -- Workshop: <WorkshopLink> -- -- Developed & Minimized using LifeBoatAPI - Stormworks Lua plugin for VSCode -- https://code.visualstudio.com/download (search "Stormworks Lua with LifeboatAPI" extension) -- By Nameous Changey -- Minimized Size: 1057 (1424 with comment) chars
m=screen z=math K=input _=K.getNumber j=z.sin i=z.cos function s(a,d,b)return{a=a,d=d,b=b}end function R(v,t)return{a=v.a+t.a,d=v.d+t.d,b=v.b+t.b}end function A(W)return W*z.pi*2 end function S(G,I,E)local g,h=i(G),j(G)local o,k=i(I),j(I)local l,f=i(E),j(E)return{{o*l,h*k*l-g*f,g*k*l+h*f},{o*f,h*k*f+g*l,g*k*f-h*l},{-k,h*o,g*o}}end function N(w,r)return M(function(e)return w[e][1]*r.a+w[e][2]*r.d+w[e][3]*r.b end)end function M(u)return{a=u(1),d=u(2),b=u(3)}end J=0 c=nil B={}y=1 function onTick()c=P()local H=s(_(28),0,_(29))y=_(30)T(c,H)J=J+1 end function onDraw()local Y,O=m.getWidth(),m.getHeight()m.drawMap(c.n.a,c.n.b,y)for Z,p in ipairs(B)do local L,ab=map.mapToScreen(c.n.a,c.n.b,y,Y,O,p.a,p.b)m.setColor(255,0,255,255)m.drawRectF(L,ac,1,1)end end function P()local Q,X,V=_(16),_(20),_(24)return{n=s(_(4),_(8),_(12)),U=S(Q,X,V)}end function T(c,H)for e=0,6 do local x=e*4 if K.getBool(e+1)then local C=_(x+1)local F=A(_(x+2))local D=A(_(x+3))local q=C*i(D)local p=s(q*j(F),C*j(D),q*i(F))local q=R(N(c.U,p),c.n)table.aa(B,q)else break end end end

c0.script:
-- Author: <Authorname> (Please change this in user settings, Ctrl+Comma) -- GitHub: <GithubLink> -- Workshop: <WorkshopLink> -- -- Developed & Minimized using LifeBoatAPI - Stormworks Lua plugin for VSCode -- https://code.visualstudio.com/download (search "Stormworks Lua with LifeboatAPI" extension) -- By Nameous Changey -- Minimized Size: 1057 (1424 with comment) chars
m=screen z=math K=input _=K.getNumber j=z.sin i=z.cos function s(a,d,b)return{a=a,d=d,b=b}end function R(v,t)return{a=v.a+t.a,d=v.d+t.d,b=v.b+t.b}end function A(W)return W*z.pi*2 end function S(G,I,E)local g,h=i(G),j(G)local o,k=i(I),j(I)local l,f=i(E),j(E)return{{o*l,h*k*l-g*f,g*k*l+h*f},{o*f,h*k*f+g*l,g*k*f-h*l},{-k,h*o,g*o}}end function N(w,r)return M(function(e)return w[e][1]*r.a+w[e][2]*r.d+w[e][3]*r.b end)end function M(u)return{a=u(1),d=u(2),b=u(3)}end J=0 c=nil B={}y=1 function onTick()c=P()local H=s(_(28),0,_(29))y=_(30)T(c,H)J=J+1 end function onDraw()local Y,O=m.getWidth(),m.getHeight()m.drawMap(c.n.a,c.n.b,y)for Z,p in ipairs(B)do local L,ab=map.mapToScreen(c.n.a,c.n.b,y,Y,O,p.a,p.b)m.setColor(255,0,255,255)m.drawRectF(L,ac,1,1)end end function P()local Q,X,V=_(16),_(20),_(24)return{n=s(_(4),_(8),_(12)),U=S(Q,X,V)}end function T(c,H)for e=0,6 do local x=e*4 if K.getBool(e+1)then local C=_(x+1)local F=A(_(x+2))local D=A(_(x+3))local q=C*i(D)local p=s(q*j(F),C*j(D),q*i(F))local q=R(N(c.U,p),c.n)table.aa(B,q)else break end end end
